title: Plant fire-adaptive traits mediate long-term fire recurrence impact on the potential supply capacity of ecosystem services and their resilience
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 365

Author(s): Paula García-Llamas, Ángela Taboada, José Manuel Fernández-Guisuraga, Susana Suárez-Seoane, M. Jaime Baeza, Otilia Reyes, Leonor Calvo
